text: T.O.P. or Choi Seung-hyun (born November 4, 1987) is a South Korean entertainer. He is a rapper, singer-songwriter, music producer, actor and model. He was born on November 4, 1987. He is the oldest member of BigBang. ==Other websites== Category:1987 births Category:Actors from Seoul Category:BigBang (South Korean band) Category:K-pop singers Category:Living people Category:South Korean rappers Category:South Korean models Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean singer-songwriters Category:South Korean television actors Category:YG Entertainment artists
title: T.O.P
